column4: anyone used quicksynergy and had a issue with it? aka thinking shift,ctrl and alt are all pressed all the time when you move mouse from screen to screen?
you can run synergy from the command line and make it log at different levels - haven't done it in a while, but man synergy will help :-)
I run 10.04 with synergy on several computers with no issue, FYI
I'm just making the point that it's not a problem with 10.04, per se
